storyInfo: As per the agreement, Iris returns a child's keepsake left with the Castle of Dreams, but finds herself met with an unusual request.

attributes.content: Hm-hmm~♪ And this is the place?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Raymond Bernard. He left his keepsake with us 37 years ago.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: A fairytale collection?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Hm. It must be written by the child himself. It's very callow...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: But it leaves a deep impression in parts, too.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Show me, show me.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: 'One day, I will make everyone read the fairytales that I write.'
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Verbatim by him, on the first page.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Fairytales...
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: What I'll say is, I could choke on the smell of this place. And all the hooligans we've crossed! Shameful manners.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Beautiful childhood dreams, and wretched present.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Every undertaking feels just as disharmonious as this.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Whoever's outside, you can come in.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I've told you, I've got no money! I'm flat broke!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I'm not saying I won't repay...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But soon! Real soon, I'll have the money! Cross my heart!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: (Er... he shouldn't be in at this time.)
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: (Did Granny get something wrong?)
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: (I don't know. We certainly don't tend to run into things like this.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (But there's a chance Granny set this up on purpose.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (Why?)
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: (Because this is a fairytale.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (And the fairy always shows up to the right person, at the right time.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: I am Iris, Master of the Castle of Dreams, Keeper of the Cradle.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: As per our agreement, I've come to return something once left to the castle.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Oh, you're door-to-door people... Sorry, I'm not buying, couldn't afford it anyway.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: And to be deathly honest, I'm surprised your boss is sending little girls out to this lonely a place.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Honestly, why can nobody just listen politely until someone is done speaking?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: This is the fairytale collection you agreed to leave with the Castle of Dreams.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: ...Castle of Dreams? Sorry, not a brand I've heard of.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Where... Where did you get this?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: You're pulling my leg!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Hey, what are you flustered for? The Castle of Dreams, the one from the fairytales, you know.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Iris is the heir, the fairy who gives children wonderful hopes.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Ting-a-ling! Fairytales are in fact real.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Seeing as the agreement is fulfilled...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: I think we'll be leaving now. We hope the fairytales you wrote stay with you forevermore.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: The fairy... Hold on, wait!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: What do you think you're up to?!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Sorry... misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I've no clue if you're real or not... but—you look so much like it! So much!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Your clothes... your speech, everything.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: What utterly rude remarks.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: We're not concoctors of lies here. Do you think we're swindling you?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Should we punish him?
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: No, no, okay.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Today is... a child's birthday, here at the orphanage.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I want you, as fairies, to come celebrate his birthday with me.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Give him... give him something as fine as a fairytale to remember.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: That's... what he wishes for, and all.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: The wish of a child?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: If what you're saying is true...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: It is, true as all!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Creating and safeguarding wonderful memories for each and every child...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Yes, it is a fairy's duty.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Um... I need to tell you in advance, though, the boy might be a little... different.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Well, no, he's a good kid. But...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Anyway, no matter what happens, please don't get mad at him.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: And most importantly, don't blow the act! I beg you!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: What's his name? How old is he this year?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Jurian.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: He's turning... seven, no... let's say eight.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: You don't even remember his age?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Eight... eight.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: (I think something's not quite normal about this man. Are you sure about going?)
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: (I'll be covering you, of course.)
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: (Grown-up or child, no one can fool a fairy when they lie.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (He's not entirely told us the truth...)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (But what I'm more concerned about is the boy.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Jurian.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Where are you hiding?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: He's been sneaking glances at us the whole time. Maybe something's up with him?
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: It might be... because you've been holding onto your scissors.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Hmph. Well, somebody's got to be keeping an eye on the grown-ups.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Careful!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Bena, you've scared him.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: He's just a child.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: You're... blue. Pretty.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Purple... dangerous...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: (Hey!)
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: (No wonder Raymond said he was only eight.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (He's been left to remain in that period, forever... a child.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Good evening, Jurian.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: I'm Iris, the blue one.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Just like the sky when there's no sign of Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Iris... sky.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: That's Bena, the purple one. Poisonous wisteria.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: But her poison is only for bad people, who try to be sneaky.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Heheh.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: (You... Don't give me that!)
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Baddie...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Uncle isn't baddie.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: (He's hiding from us on purpose, and especially Raymond.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (Is Jurian calling himself a bad person?)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Jurian, bad people don't meet the fairy from the stories.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Your uncle told me today was your birthday.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: ...Birthday.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: That's right, your birthday!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Yes, birthday!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Today's my birthday! Uncle.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: So the fairy from the stories is here, to celebrate your birthday.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Stories... fairy. New friend?
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Um... yes, yes, yes!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Hello...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Jurian, might hurt... dangerous.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Can't meet.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Oh, Jurian!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: He's done a runner.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: You didn't frighten him, did you?
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: It wasn't me that scared him off.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (Why haven't I seen any more of the orphanage's children?)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (Are the two of them the only ones here?)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Jurian, listen now.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Open up the door, okay?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Leave him be for a while.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: You'll only make him more nervous at this rate.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Sorry... I think it's been too long since he's seen a stranger.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: He's not usually like this... he's good.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Meet a fairy from the stories. Celebrate a birthday together.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Raymond, was that really Jurian's wish?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: I'll be frank, I've noticed how he avoided you the whole time.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Keeping a distance on purpose, even denying contact.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: He... fears you.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: No he doesn't!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Chop-chop!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Agh... I'm sorry. I mean...
attributes.name: Raymond
Raymond
attributes.content: Jurian's just a bit...

attributes.name: Raymond
attributes.content: Uncomfortable.
I haven't spent time with him in a long while, too, so...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: (It seems I'm right.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (The one longing for a fairytale here is Raymond, not Jurian.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: You know liars are bad people, and bad people get banished from fairytale worlds.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: I'm not, I'm not!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: If you don't want this story to end like that...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Is it just the two of you here? Where are the rest of the children?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Be honest this time.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: If you must ask.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: It was years and years ago, I only adopted a child out of a moment of softheartedness.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But after that... well, more and more children came in, and before I even knew it, my place became an orphanage.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I didn't realize... my home would get so run-down over time, though. The state it's in now...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: With so many years gone by, most of the children have left. Jurian's the only one who's stayed here.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: You've seen—how he is.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Oh, I think that's the cake people come to deliver.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Just hang around a while longer, just until we're done celebrating. Please, I'm begging you!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: You're such professionals, honestly, I can pay you extra! You have my thanks a million times!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: How overboard.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: What are we, actors for hire from some flimsy Victorian theater? I hardly think we have hourly rates.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: They're all such lovers of the exquisite craft that makes up those stories—and yet they don't believe the fairytale happening right in their faces.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: The more elaborate stories are always married to reality in some form. It comes in clear indicators, like signs on emergency exits, the kinds of things that make people jump for joy as if they've been redeemed.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: But fairytales are too free, freeform to the point you might want to pray for something, but wouldn't even know how to start going about it.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: That's why grown-ups don't believe. What they're after is help that comes with a clear price tag, anywhere, anytime.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: But children will believe, because fairytales are the friends that accompany them. Even in the gloomy vales, there's no fear they're alone.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: That said, haven't you realized?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Raymond is the one who's truly hoping for a fairy.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Him? You can tell he doesn't believe in fairytales from a mile away.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: 'Fairies' always bring miracles, after all. The fact he doesn't credit fairytales hardly matters.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: As long as Jurian can believe, as long as he can have 'a perfect birthday'...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: He'll accept it.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Sounds like he's using us.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: I'll tail him.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Just don't do anything rash, Bena.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: I'll take a look around. If we're going to construct a fairytale dreamland, we need to feel things out, think them through, know them top to bottom.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: And need I say, this is quite real. The child isn't feigning it. I can't just toss this aside.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: If Raymond does intend on doing anything bad...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: I'll be punishing him.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Chop-chop!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: You really can't just hang on one moment?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: We're in a hurry to get rich, us brothers.
attributes.name: Greedy Mercenary

attributes.content: Fork it over. Whatcha got this time?
attributes.name: Brutish Mercenary

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Just this much.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Oh, yeah!
attributes.name: Greedy Mercenary

attributes.content: Quiet!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: What? Scared your dumb boy's going to find out?
attributes.name: Greedy Mercenary

attributes.content: What's it matter if he does? Just do him in, job's done.
attributes.name: Brutish Mercenary

attributes.content: And my money?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Greedy Mercenary

attributes.content: You really are...
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: A bunch of terrible children.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: The hell are you?!
attributes.name: Brutish Mercenary

attributes.content: By the looks of things, plenty of children did once live here.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Almost all the rooms have been turned into child's bedrooms, and the place is littered with child-sized odds and ends.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: It's odd though... Jurian's room is so far away from all the rest of them.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: It's not even on the same floor.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: But it is very close to Raymond's.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Iris
Iris
attributes.content: Is this a group photo of them all?

attributes.name: Iris
attributes.content: One... two...
attributes.joined: Is this a group photo of them all?One... two...

attributes.content: Thirteen children.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: And Jurian's absent?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Hmm, hmm~♪ Why do we always travel so far flung, out from the city, through village old and young~♪
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: No soul to answer, no soul to care, the shepherds leave the beasts in the wild to fare~♪
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Don't shed a tear now, don't let it hurt...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Audrey, sit here.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Peewee, next to you.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: A rusted silver-gray teapot, a faded building block...
These items lacking any life are, one by one, given names by Jurian.
In Jurian's nebulous perception, they are, and have always been, his playmates.
Good evening, Jurian.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Ah!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Oh, what's wrong?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Mess! Mess!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: You can't make messy!
attributes.name: Jurian
Jurian
attributes.content: Spoon, knife...

attributes.name: Jurian
attributes.content: Fork, fork...
Ah, I'm so sorry about that.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: There, now we're all in place.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Mmm... can't make messy...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Do you remember me?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Mm. Blue.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Color like no Catastrophe. Friend.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: That's right. No Catastrophe in the sky.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Won't you introduce me to all your lovely little friends?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: ...Jurian, can't touch.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Really, what a way to treat a fairy who's come to visit. It's incredibly rude, you know.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: If that's how it must be...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Now come wisplight and lamplight, come light up the way~♪
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Come to our little tea party to stay~♪
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: The eyes of the 'children' are like a stage growing in all directions.
From afar comes a fairytale forest's morning breeze, wafting through the curtains.
The flames upon the candlesticks entwine like partners for the ball.
Here come the guards, and they dance and sing for us~♪
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Carrying scissors to chop-chop away~♪
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Jubilation.
Hops, skips, and jumps.
This is the magic that children are given.
Really beautiful! Pretty!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Not every child is lucky enough to witness a fairy's magic, you know.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: So you must be a tremendously exceptional one.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Fairy, new friend...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Of course Miss Fairy is your friend.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Jurian, scared, to hurt friend.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: A fairy is a friend that can't be hurt, you know. Not by anyone.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: A friend who'll always be by your side.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Mmm?
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: If you lie, you're a gloompincer.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Audrey, this one. Talks a lot.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Peewee, always plays with me. Friend.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Ronnie, angry. Loud.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: (The teapot with no lid is the talkative Audrey.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (The faded building block, his best friend Peewee.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (The necklace inlaid with jewels, the tempersome Ronnie.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (These must be the things his past friends left behind.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Jurian, can you answer a few questions for me?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Remember, if you lie, you're a gloompincer.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Mmm! If you lie, you're a gloompincer!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Well, then...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Raymond. Uncle. What is he?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: ...Uncle, always looking after Jurian. Looking after family.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: So why do you always hide from him?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Uncle, won't see me.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: I'm... a bad person, hurt Uncle.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Your friends, the other children. Where did they go?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Friends. Friends all gone.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Jurian hurt friends! Gone!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: All gone!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Chop-chop!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Bad child caught!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Bad child! Jurian, bad child!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: She doesn't mean you.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Jurian, bad child!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Bena, what's going on?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: I sneaked my way over, but never saw even a hint of delicious birthday cake.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Instead, I found this rotten boy selling off any valuables here to a bunch of awful silly billies.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Wait! Listen, I can explain!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: You're not exactly a first-timer either, are you?
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Where are the other children? You can't have sold them off too, can you?
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Uncle...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Jurian?! What are you doing out here?!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: (Hushed) Can we please talk about this in private?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: (Hushed) At least not in front of Jurian.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Heheh! Not a chance.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Purple... bad.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Jurian!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Goodness!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Arts?! He doesn't even have an Arts Unit!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Jurian! No!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Bena, you said Raymond was selling things off?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Quite right.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Jurian, wait!
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Let go! Uncle can't touch!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: You won't hit me!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Bena, no making a scene!
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Really, the lot of you are incorrigible children.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Raymond, come here.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: *sigh*.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Were those your partners in crime?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (No!)
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Baddie!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Chop-chop!
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: Jurian, you must listen to the fairy.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: We're off to find your friends.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Friends!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: (There's still children here? Where?)
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: (Hmph. Nowhere. You did sell them all off, after all.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (Inside every shipment of goods you sent off, I imagine.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (No, that's ridiculous! I was only selling...)
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: (The longing and yearning Jurian has for his friends...)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (...is placed within the objects that signify them.)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (Eh?)
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: (What exactly was it that happened?)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Well?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Hm... I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but he's been infected.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: How? All the other children are clearly fine.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: How bad is it? Serious?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Serious or not, that's not your concern right now. You should be worried for yourself.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: If... they find you've got an Infected here, then you won't just be legally hamstrung...
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: You'll put the rest of the children in peril.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Uncle, going out? Going out!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: I, I'll carry stuff, this luggage.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Jurian, come with me.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: You're moving onto this floor now. It'll be... easier, for your Uncle to look after you.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: And you have to tell me before you go downstairs.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: If you want to go play, I'll play with you.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: No buts!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.text: Did I do a—do a bad thing?

attributes.content: You never realized?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: How hurt, how panicked he'd be when he couldn't find his friends?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: I... I thought it was just stuff he couldn't find.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I thought he just talked to those things because he was so bored.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: They're not things. They're friends.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: His most precious friends, ever since you drove everyone away from him.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Save it!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: What choice did I have?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Look at the state of me, a noble... heheh, heh...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I don't think anyone else except me would have even taken him in.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But I'm threadbare... selling valuables is the only way I can get by.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Raymond...
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: There was nothing I could do! Nothing!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I don't have the first clue about Oripathy... I was scared it'd spread to the other children.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But I... I couldn't abandon Jurian.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Hurt... friends...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: If you get close, hurt.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Uncle is, good person.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Sorry... I know you mean well.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: You're professionals through and through.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But fake, in the end, is fake.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Fake...
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Can't find... friends?
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: No need for pretenses now. You can take all the money I got selling the stuff.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I'd be lost for anything on the off-chance you got infected. You'd best go.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Fairy... blue, is fake?
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Sorry, Jurian. I shouldn't be lying to you.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I just wanted to...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Jurian! Come back!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Jurian!
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Where are you going?!
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Leave... Jurian wants to leave.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Then... Audrey, and Peewee, and... they'll come back.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Jurian is leaving.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Don't, get close!
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Jurian, just hold it!
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Blue, color like no Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: I really like, the stories in, dining hall.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Jurian, can't control.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Dangerous purple, dangerous.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Drastic measures it is.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: It seems naughty children need to be taught a little lesson!
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: (Bena, drag Raymond over as well!)
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Dark! Where is Jurian?
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Where is this?
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Don't be afraid. I'm by your side.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Blue.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: There is a person holding onto you. Are they hurt?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Hand... blue... not like blue.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Answer me, now. Are they hurt?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: No... very warm.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Holding tight... Jurian can feel, pulse.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Very fast pulse.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Then you can open your eyes now.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: The one holding your hand is your uncle, Raymond.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Do you see? You won't hurt anyone.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: *cough* Ahem...
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Well, this is a little... embarrassing.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Jurian, not purple.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: You're blue too. Okay?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Mmm. No Catastrophe in the sky.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: The purest, clearest sky.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: But... Jurian's friends.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Remember the wish you made to me?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: That's your agreement with the fairy now.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Once made, it's never to be broken.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: As for you. Hmph.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: As is perfectly clear, you built a candy house straight from a fairytale by your own two hands.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Even as it melted and crumbled bit by bit, you never chose to leave.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: But somehow, you forgot the most important thing.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: What... What did I forget?
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: *sigh*... What a stubborn, blind grown-up you are.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: No wonder nobody of age has found their way to the Castle of Dreams in so long.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Do you have on you, right now, the item you left with the Castle?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Eh? Oh, oh, oh.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: The children hid inside their home, but with a single puff, the terrible beast blew off their roof.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: The children panicked and ran outside, but with a single tap, the ferocious beast destroyed the last things they had.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: With nowhere left to go, the children followed a trail of breadcrumbs, and in the forest they found a candy house.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: That candy house you built for them was as sturdy as a castle.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: And that is a fairytale ending.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But what kind of ending is it, really, to have nothing aside from a castle?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: The evil witch may well gobble up everyone within.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: The tyrant king would soon make slaves of them all.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: What really matters is what stories take place inside the castle.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: What did you write on the first page?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: 'One day, I will make everyone read the fairytales that I write.'
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Yes, fairytales.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: We see to it that wonderful, hopeful fairytales take place, inside those tiniest castles in the depths of every child's heart.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: We use the castle to keep them safe and sound, to protect them.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Don't we?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: And yet all I gave them was fear.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I'd forgotten the fairytales I wrote myself.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: But you still believe.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: How else would Bena and I be here?
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: And of course, it isn't just for your sake.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: It's for Jurian's, too.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Blue... Iris. Blue is called Iris.
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: A fairy, right?
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Are... you really real?
attributes.name: Jurian

attributes.content: Indeed I am.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: So thought Jurian as he woke up in the forest. He remembered how if he followed the forest trail, he would find the way to the Castle of Dreams.
Jurian walked and walked, until he found a teapot with no lid.
It was the talkative Audrey.

attributes.text: 'Jurian, Jurian! You've got to hear this, yesterday, I saw a manglerbeast in the forest burying honey in the ground.'
'And then he walked around and around, and around and around, waiting for the honey to grow, hahahaha!'

attributes.content: Jurian and Audrey walked and walked, until they found a necklace inlaid with jewels.
It was the tempersome Ronnie.

attributes.text: 'Hmph! I was waiting forever for you.'
'Are you thick, Jurian? Manglers don't bury honey, they wouldn't do that.'

attributes.content: Jurian and Audrey and Ronnie walked and walked, until they found a faded building block.
It was the faithful playmate Peewee.

attributes.text: 'We're almost to the Castle of Dreams!'

attributes.content: Jurian and Audrey and Ronnie and Peewee walked and walked.
Until a path in the forest opened up before them.
There, the castle, every bit as dreamlike as its name, opened its grand gate wide.
Out before them came but a fairy dressed in blue, who gave an elegant greeting.

attributes.text: 'I am Iris, Master of the Castle of Dreams, Keeper of the Cradle.'

attributes.content: I've had a talk with Granny. Jurian will be staying at the Castle of Dreams.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: He'll greet and guide every child lucky enough to pay the Castle a visit.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Thank you. Really, I don't know how to thank you enough. That you'd do all this for Jurian.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: You needn't thank us.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: It's the fairytale ending children ought to have.
attributes.name: Iris

attributes.content: Mm, mhm.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I've sold off the manor and the rest of my belongings, and found a new place in the city, and a new job.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I'll be working with orphanages for as long as I live.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: I'll see that every child hears my fairytales.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Once something is returned from the Castle of Dreams, the time magic loses its effect.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: You'll have to take care of your fairytale collection yourself from now on.
attributes.name: Bena

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Raymond

attributes.content: Then I believe Jurian, and the rest of the children, will very much look forward to the day they can hear of the fairytales you write.
attributes.name: Iris
